title: Public engagement is key for containing COVID-19 pandemic.
text: Public engagement is key for containing COVID-19 pandemic.

similar.title: Using public health law to contain the spread of COVID-19.
text: Using public health law to contain the spread of COVID-19.

Richard Griffith, Senior Lecturer in Health Law at Swansea University, considers what powers are available to ministers, health and local authorities to minimise the spread of the novel coronavirus and the disease it causes.
abstract: Richard Griffith, Senior Lecturer in Health Law at Swansea University, considers what powers are available to ministers, health and local authorities to minimise the spread of the novel coronavirus and the disease it causes.
